title: Claude Code 2.1 - Major Feature Release with 1,096 Commits
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.1.0, the largest update ever with 1,096 commits, introducing Skills hot-reload, session teleportation between devices, async sub-agents, Shift+Enter multi-line input, clickable file hyperlinks, source path metadata for images, and 40+ new features across versions 2.1.0 through 2.1.17.

community_feedback.quote: Some HN commenters questioned reliability after rapid commits, described it as a 'pragmatic autonomy push'
Version 2.1.0 has bugs... update to 2.1.1. Run: claude update
Skills hot-reload and the 16+ new changes are making workflows significantly smoother

title: Cursor CLI with Plan and Ask Modes
description: Cursor released a major CLI update introducing new Agent Modes (Plan and Ask), cloud handoff for offloading background tasks to the cloud, one-click MCP authentication, and enhanced model management. Cursor 2.4.23 was released on January 29, 2026, with continuous updates throughout the month.

community_feedback.quote: 10 out of 10 times the output with Plan mode performed 'significantly better' than just starting to talk and spewing everything into the conversation
Things get better in plan mode but there's 'some need for a lightweight inline plan mode'
There's no way to switch to Plan mode in Claude Code, which has become a notable feature
The plan shouldn't just be ephemeral chat history

title: Parallel Sub-Agent Execution and Skills System
description: GitHub Copilot's January 2026 update introduced parallel sub-agent execution allowing multiple AI agents to work simultaneously instead of sequentially, significantly cutting wait time. Also added a new skills system, deeper Claude integration, new settings for tool failure behavior in Chat view, and GitHub organization-level custom instruction support.

community_feedback.quote: Parallel AI agents are a game changer
You can now run sub-agents in parallel - includes video demonstration. Major UX improvements for sub-agents
All three research subagents run concurrently instead of sequentiallyâ€”cutting total wait time significantly
Autonomous agents can handle terminal commands and parallel research. Notes 90% adoption at Salesforce with 30% boost in PR velocity

title: JetBrains Plugin Version 2.12.5 with Performance Improvements
description: Windsurf released JetBrains plugin version 2.12.5 on January 25, 2026, featuring improved file search performance, fixed diagnostics downloading while changing file names, and settings sync between Cascade & Plugin. Also added priority processing support for GPT-5.1 models with guaranteed low-latency responses (~50 tokens/sec).

community_feedback.quote: Windsurf is actually great... their biggest complaint turned out to be a VSCode-inherited bug
Users expressed frustration with changes but showed hope for improvement. Many users loved what Windsurf was capable of despite issues

title: Version 0.26.0 with Agent Skills Launch
description: Gemini CLI released version 0.26.0 around January 26, 2026, officially launching Agent Skills that allow users to extend Gemini CLI functionality with specialized capabilities. Also includes significant performance improvements, fixes for PDF token estimation issues, and core stability enhancements.

community_feedback.quote: Agent Skills and Hooks, LFG!!! ðŸš€
VT Code joins Amp, Claude Code, Codex, Pi, Droid, Gemini CLI on agentskills.io - indicating Agent Skills is part of a broader ecosystem
Agent Skills support is 'Designed for AI coding agents like #GeminiCLI, #ClaudeCode, and others with system prompt integration'

title: Version 0.93.0 with SOCKS5 Proxy Support
description: OpenAI released Codex CLI version 0.93.0 on January 31, 2026, adding an optional SOCKS5 proxy listener with policy enforcement and config gating. Also updated GPT-5.2 personality system prompt on January 22, 2026. Plan mode now streams proposed changes.

title: Enterprise Features Update and Cognizant Partnership
description: Devin announced major enterprise features including solutions for repository management challenges, enterprise scaling capabilities, and improved sleep state messaging. Cognizant and Cognition announced a strategic partnership on January 28, 2026, to scale autonomous software engineering across enterprise operations. Waydev integration added Devin to AI Adoption tracking on January 23, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: Reports 50% reduction in PR review time with Devin Review feature
